data.title: Death Notice of William (Liam) O'Donovan (The Glen, Cork)
data.meta_description: The death has occurred of William (Liam) O'Donovan of The Glen, Cork Ireland, on 20/08/2023. You can view the full death notice and add your condolences here.
data.text:
OâDONOVAN (Cork) On 20th August 2023, peacefully, surrounded by his loving family and in the tender care of the staff of Cork University Hospital, WILLIAM (LIAM), late of Comeragh Park, The Glen. Beloved husband of the late Mary (nee Barry) and loving father of Sandra, Angie, William, Launie and the late Michael, cherished by his grandchildren and great grandchildren, loving brother of Jimmy, Joe and Eileen and beloved son of the late Jerry Fox and Madgie May.

Sadly missed by his loving family, brothers, sister, especially his sister-in-law Nora, sons-in-law, daughter-in-law, nephews, nieces, extended family, neighbours and friends.

Reposing at Coughlanâs Funeral Home, Shandon Street on Monday (21st August) at 10.00am, family in attendance from 7.00pm with Rosary at 8.00pm. Requiem Mass on Tuesday (22nd August) at 1.30pm in St. Brendanâs Church, The Glen. If you wish to view the Mass click on https://www.mycondolences.ie and follow link. Funeral afterwards to St. Maryâs Old Cemetery, Curraghkippane.

May he rest in peace.

The Condolence Book is open below.
